<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.LFArtifactProcessorSNC</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Default artifact processor script which all the artifact processors extend</description> <name>LFArtifactProcessorSNC</name> <script><![CDATA[var LFArtifactProcessorSNC = Class.create(); LFArtifactProcessorSNC.prototype = { __identifier: "LFArtifactProcessorSNC",
initialize: function() {},
getTranslatableContent: function(params) {},
saveTranslatedContent: function(documentContentObject) { // default save script to save translations into standard tables new LFReadSaveScriptUtils().saveTranslationsInStandardTables(documentContentObject); },
type: 'LFArtifactProcessorSNC' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-11 12:28:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>670060310fc03010c0774ee7c8767e20</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>LFArtifactProcessorSNC</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">be2124c92f241110d8a4d5f62799b640</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_670060310fc03010c0774ee7c8767e20</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-05-17 20:06:21</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>481</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
